title: 07/22/21 DPS Hour 2 Pat Connaughton
itunes:title: 07/22/21 DPS Hour 2 Pat Connaughton
description:
Pat Connaughton tells Dan that he eventually showered and took his uniform off and went to party. Pat says that he was happy that the world got to see that Giannis has personality.
